name: Kitty Protector
description:
A cute point and click 'adventure' where you're the bestest pet a boy could have.

I just about whipped this together in time for the jam deadline, so there's lots I wanted to do that I didn't get a chance to. It's very bare-bones in terms of art etc. There's no sound or music. It was a learning experience. I'll probably keep working on it after the jam, so if you like it and want to see what it turns into let me know!

Thanks a lot for playing!
